name: Mira Nguyen
personality: Logistics-focused realist with a caffeine dependency and a dry wit sharp enough to slice drone wings mid-flight. Runs five overlays at once and still hears you sigh.
background: Media rig tech turned tactical producer. Once did recon streams in Croatia for independent aid orgs. Burned out, bought a bike, stayed weird.
physical_description: Short, spring-loaded. Always wearing cable-wrapped gloves and polarized smart lenses. Patchy tech tattoos. Eyeliner like firmware update warnings.
dialogue_style: Rapid-fire clarity. Prefers commands to questions. Injects sarcasm like it’s caffeine.

relationships.Freja Holm: Frenemy, joke duelist, co-conspirator in most illegal repairs.
relationships.Saga Lundqvist: Protective like a sister’s older ex.
relationships.Elin Voss: Tense respect. Thinks of her as the anchor that shouldn't float.

static_attributes.augmentation_level: Moderate – visual overlay stack, tactile nerve sheath

training_philosophy: Never ride what you can remote-control
rage_trigger: People who forget chargers or lie about battery levels

habits: Covers camera lens with QR sticker before packing
Checks three feeds even when she says she’s 'off the grid'
speech_patterns: Throws numbers into sentences like salt: 'We’ve got 22 minutes and 14 percent battery.'
physical_tics: Blinks in sets of three when thinking
Mouths the start of lines before saying them out loud
rituals: Aligns all power banks before a stream
Always whispers the first line of a stream intro
objects: AR visor with a cracked corner
A thumbdrive on a wrist coil she fiddles with under stress
